What are the constraints for this? I created a new config for a HelloWorld, and 
stored it in the root project folder with no problems?

Exact steps
Clicked New button with Java Application type selected (works on copying a 
config that has been set to local as well)
Click the shared radio button
Click on Browse
Select a project from the list
Hit apply
